wikipedia_page.main: Lieutenant General Sir George Pemberton Ross Norton  is a retired British Army officer. He was the UK Military Representative to NATO. He is now Commandant Royal College of Defence Studies.

response: The College is led by the Commandantcurrently Sir George Norton. The Commandant leads the Senior Directing Staff of the College, who are in effect the faculty and are a mixture of active and retired military officers, diplomats and civil servants.
*Major-General Sir George Norton  2011–2013 late Grenadier GuardsThe Court Circular, 29 June 2011

link_mentions.page: Commandant Royal College of Defence Studies
response: *Lieutenant General Sir George Norton KCVO CBE (2020)

He was promoted to major general and appointed Major-General commanding the Household Division and General Officer Commanding London District in 2007. He was invested by the Queen as a Knight Commander of the Royal Victorian Order on relinquishing his appointment on 29 June 2011.  He was succeeded as Major General Commanding the Household Division and General Officer Commanding London District by Major General George Norton.The Court Circular 29 June 2011

link_mentions.page: List of permanent representatives of the United Kingdom to NATO

response: * Major General George Norton , on relinquishing the appointment of Major General Commanding the Household Division – 12 July 2013

Kingwell joined the Royal Navy in 1984. He served as commanding officer successively of the patrol boat HMS Pursuer, the frigate HMS Argyll and the amphibious transport dock HMS Albion. He went on to be Commander United Kingdom Task Group in January 2011 and in that role commanded the task group off Libya. After that he became Head of Naval Resources and Plans in November 2011, Director of the Development, Concepts and Doctrine Centre in October 2013 and Deputy Commandant of the Royal College of Defence Studies in May 2016 before becoming Commandant of the Royal College of Defence Studies in July 2019. He handed over the post to George Norton on 21 July 2020.
